title: habgames | indie custom developer | game and app development
description: Custom development of games and mobile applications. We write custom mobile and desktop games, scripts, and art. Full transfer of rights to the game.

home.title: Hi! We are habgames...
home.description: We love to make games, cover the gaming industry, write mind-blowing scripts and draw cool art. In Indy, development came in 2019 and over the years have taken part in commercially successful games and more.
